body.p: The old Change Details panel was rather static, and changing adding/removing columns, as well as the sequence of the colums was time consuming and error prone. The new panel allows to quickly shift the elements in pane Available to the Selected pane. After that, the sequence of the single elements can be changed by pressing the Up and Down arrows.

Once the column sequence has been adjusted, the layout can be saved per window type such as Document List Window or Translation Memory List window etc. by clicking on the button Save as default list. Formerly saved default-lists can be loaded by clicking on the button Save as default list.
